error.system-error-desc: System upgrade in process. Thanks for your patience!
error.not-found-desc: The page you are trying to access does NOT exist!
error.no_permission_access_file: You no longer have permission to access this file. Please try refreshing your web page or contact your workspace admin.
error.recommend_chrome: The 4D ShoeTech web app is currently best experienced using the latest version of Google Chrome. Copy this URL {{4d}} and paste it into your Chrome browser, or download Google Chrome here: {{chrome}}
error.access_denied: Access Denied. Subaccounts currently do not support purchase behavior.
error.download_only_one: You can only download one file
error.only_share_from_ws: You can only share file from WS
error.only_add_from_material_design: You can only add files to shortcut from "My Material" or "My Design"
error.cant_upload_raw_file: You can't upload raw file here
error.only_download_raw_file: You can only download a raw file
error.cant_upload_model: You can't upload model from here
error.cant_upload_material: You can't upload material from here
error.cant_copy_file: You can't copy file from library
error.cant_cut_file: You can't cut file from library
error.cant_move_file: You can't move file from here
error.cant_paste_file2material: You can not paste file to material library
error.cant_paste_diff_data: Can not paste difference type of data
error.cant_copy_lib2lib: Can't copy item from library or to library
error.cant_upload_image: You can't upload image from here
error.cant_submit_review: 存在不是待评审状态的面料
error.cant_submit_review_no_4ddat: 没有4ddat文件及材质图片，暂不能评审

code_msg._10404: The operation failed! The file has been deleted.
code_msg._100404: The operation failed! The file has been deleted.
code_msg._100401: Current login session inactive for too long. For security purposes, please re-enter your entire login information.
code_msg._100403: Action NOT permitted, contact your Admin.
code_msg._131001: Wrong account or password, please re-enter.
code_msg._131005: Account not registered, Sign Up now.
code_msg._131006: This e-mail has not been verified, please click on the e-mail link sent to complete verification.
code_msg._131007: This account registration was unsuccessful, please try again.
code_msg._131008: This account pass is expired or has not come into effect yet.
code_msg._131011: Update failed, please check your network and refresh the page.
code_msg._131015: The password entered is incorrect and the linked email can not be changed.
code_msg._131013: This account is already linked to or is a member of this business.

code_msg._131016: This link is inactive. Please reach out to its sender to obtain a Workspace Pass and gain access to this Workspace.
code_msg._131017: workspace pass can not be invited.
code_msg._131019: Account locked until midnight tonight due to security concerns. Try again after midnight. You may also try to Reset Password or Log in with verification code.

validator.char_len_at_least: character's length should be at least {{min}}
validator.char_len_between: character length should be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validator.img_should_exceed: Image resolution should exceed 1024 or exceed 300 dpi.
validator.same_as_prev: This password does not match the other password you entered
validator.space_not_start_end: white space do not allow in start or in end
validator.at_least_one_option: at least select one of the options
validator.num_and_alpha: at least contain a number or alphabet or underscore
validator.num_alpha_underscore: at least contain a number or alphabet or underscore
validator.not_only_digit_letter: can not only contain digits or latin letters
validator.only_digit_letter: only contain digits or latin letters
validator.must_digit_letter: must/only contain digits and latin letters
validator.white_space: field cannot start with whitespace or end with whitespace

info.collect_tip: Save and use in your own library later
info.creator: Creator
info.attachment_images_tip: Image with 4:3 or 1:1 aspect ratio is recommended. Maximum of 6 material images (not including thumbnail images).
info.attachment_images_tip2: Note: Each image is limited to 3 MB in file size.
info.attachment_images_tip3: Note: Each image is limited to 18 MB in file size.
info.attachment_videos_tip: Limited to only 1 video upload per material currently. Video with 16:9 aspect ratio and length between 9 to 30 seconds is recommended.
info.attachment_videos_tip2: Note: Each video is limited to 30MB in file size.
info.notes_placeholder: Highlight here if a material is "suitable for" or "not suitable for" a particular product part or product usage purpose, plus any other unique product attributes and properties.

upload.disclaimer_content: 4D ShoeTech and this Platform does not verify intellectual property rights such as trademark rights, copyrights or ownerships of any artwork, materials, patterns, colors, design work, or any creative artwork files uploaded. Any infringement on and violation of such intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user and/or uploader of such files.
upload.map_missing_tip: The required Map types are missing.
